| HistoryText             = The Bod Squad was comprised of [[Doctor Nod (Earth-616)|Doctor Nod]]'s three henchmen, who had ingested a pill of his invention which allowed them to alter their body weight at will for up to twenty-hours, which had been created using genetic material from [[Ashley Crawford (Earth-616)|Big Bertha]].{{r|Great Lakes Avengers Vol 1 5}}

The Bod Squad failed to stop Bertha from escaping Doctor Nod's laboratory,{{r|Great Lakes Avengers Vol 1 5}} and later assisted their boss in confronting her and the [[Great Lakes Avengers (Earth-616)|Great Lakes Avengers]]. The Bod Squad was defeated by the combined efforts of Big Bertha and [[Goodness Silva (Earth-616)|Good Boy]], and their boss was subsequently killed by [[Craig Hollis (Earth-616)|Mister Immortal]].{{r|Great Lakes Avengers Vol 1 7}}
